      • setToRandomValue

        public void setToRandomValue(java.util.Random a_numberGenerator,
                    boolean onlyPerturbFromCurrentValue)
        Set weight to random value from a Gaussian distribution determined by RANDOM_STD_DEV
        Specified by:
        setToRandomValue in class Allele
        Parameters:
        a_numberGenerator -
        onlyPerturbFromCurrentValue - if true then the weight is perturbed by a random amount determine by a Gaussian distribution determined by RANDOM_STD_DEV multiplied by RANDOM_PERTURBATION_FACTOR.
